2,3,4,5,6,7,8:
set my watch half an hour fast
把我的表拨快了半小时

8:
sharp
本意是锋利的, 在这里表示准时的.

Our English class always begins at 8:30 sharp.
Discussion will begin at 4:30 sharp.
2,3:
opening address
用来作为开始的那个演讲

address
/əˈdres/ 
a formal speech.

1,2:
then+n
接下来是XXX

then a small reception
then a Q&A session
then a 5min break

4,5,6,7,8,9:
表示从几点到几点的说法一览
run from...until...
go from...to/until..
is from...to/until...
begin/start at...end/finish at...

1,2,3:
until what time
直到几点?

-After the seminar, we'll have dinner.
讨论之后, 我们会吃晚饭
-Until when?
直到几点?

4:
receive=接收
reception=接待会

你如何去接收你的客人,那就是你的接待会.

在会议之前后提供一些吃的喝的, 让大家可以互相交流, 这个就叫reception

1:
workshop
work工作, shop商店
合在一起表示:
人们聚在一起, (在店里)讨论工作或某个话题.

workshop=seminar
2,3,4,5,6,7:
run from...to...
从几点到几点

The seminars run from 1:30 to 4:30
The second session runs from 1:30 to 4:30

表示从几点到几点的说法一览
run from...until...
go from...to/until..
is from...to/until...
begin/start at...end/finish at...

3,4:
日期的写法一般是
September 14th
一般读作September fourteenth.

1,2,3,4:
I have an appointment
我有一个预约

模仿造句
I have an appointment with my dentist tonight.
我今晚和我的牙医有一个预约
5,6,7,8:
back
回到...去

I have a meeting in shang hai on Thursday.
我周四在上海有个会
I have a meeting back in shang hai on Thursday.
我周四回上海有个会

4:
already
adv 已经

Is it noon already?
Is the meeting over already?
Are you finished already?
